message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $115? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $122. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $118? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $125. I think that's a fair price for this amazing product. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at that price.
